edge: Cooper joins U.S. Marshal Jackson, protecting Felipe Riva and his wife Daniella

When the assassins show up, they stow away in a horse trailer hooked to a pickup truck. When the truck stops, Cooper tries to steal it, but the owner, Red, reappears with a gun. She and Daniella flee, find another pickup, and drive away.
